mapper.select: SELECT e.name, e.empno, c.eventTitle, c.eventWriter, c.eventStartdate, c.eventEnddate, c.eventCategory, c.eventMemo, c.eventLoc, c.eventDelete, a.attendRes, a.attendRsvp, a.attendId, a.eventId FROM event c JOIN attendee a ON c.eventId=a.eventId JOIN emp e ON c.eventWriter=e.empno WHERE a.attendRes = 100 AND a.attendId=#{attendId}

SELECT e.name, e.empno, c.eventTitle, c.eventStartdate, c.eventEnddate, c.eventCategory, c.eventMemo, c.eventLoc, c.eventDelete, a.attendRes, a.attendRsvp, a.attendId, a.eventId FROM event c JOIN attendee a ON c.eventId=a.eventId JOIN emp e ON a.attendId=e.empno WHERE c.eventWriter=#{eventWriter} AND TRUNC(c.eventStartdate) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY c.eventId, e.empno

SELECT DISTINCT eventId, eventTitle, eventWriter, TO_char(eventStartdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') eventStartdate, TO_char(eventEnddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') eventEnddate, eventCategory, eventLoc, eventMemo, eventDelete FROM event WHERE eventDelete=100 AND eventCategory=100

SELECT DISTINCT e.eventId, e.eventTitle, e.eventWriter, TO_char(e.eventStartdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') eventStartdate, TO_char(e.eventEnddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') eventEnddate, e.eventCategory, e.eventLoc, e.eventMemo, e.eventDelete FROM event e Left JOIN attendee a ON e.eventId=a.eventId WHERE e.eventDelete=100 AND e.eventCategory=110 AND (e.eventWriter = #{empno} OR (a.attendId = #{empno} AND a.attendres=110))

SELECT DISTINCT e.eventId, e.eventTitle, e.eventWriter, TO_char(eventStartdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') eventStartdate, TO_char(eventEnddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') eventEnddate, e.eventCategory, e.eventLoc, e.eventMemo, e.eventDelete FROM event e WHERE e.eventDelete=100 AND e.eventCategory=120 AND e.eventWriter=#{empno}

SELECT DISTINCT e.eventId, e.eventTitle, e.eventWriter, TO_char(e.eventStartdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') eventStartdate, TO_char(e.eventEnddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') eventEnddate, e.eventCategory, e.eventLoc, e.eventMemo, e.eventDelete FROM event e Left JOIN attendee a ON e.eventId=a.eventId WHERE e.eventDelete=100 AND e.eventCategory=130 AND a.attendId=#{empno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendee (eventId, attendId, attendRes, attendRsvp) VALUES (#{eventId}, #{attendId}, #{attendRes}, #{attendRsvp})
